activities: AppSense, Inc. processes or contemplates processing EEA and Swiss personal data relating to (1) its current, former, and prospective employees and those of any of its European subsidiaries/affiliates for purposes of global human resources administration and management, (2) representatives and employees of actual and prospective corporate customers and business partners in order to manage business relationships and provide products or contracted services, (3) representatives and employees of actual and prospective vendors and suppliers in order to manage business relationships and receive contracted goods and services, (4) individuals whose data AppSense, Inc. processes on behalf of business customers as a service provider or mere data processor, (4) product end users and prospects in order to provide information on services and products, (5)end users and customers in order to fulfill and process orders for our services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Offline, online, manually or automatically processed customer, prospect, supplier, vendor, partner and human resources data
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
